analysis.key_quote: Our civil service will crumble if every four years everyone is replaced -- it will become like the Chicago of my youth where each election meant massive firings followed by patronage hiring.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses strong opposition to the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about vague criteria for removal, the risk of politicization, and the potential loss of institutional knowledge, all of which align with defending the current merit-based civil service system.
